name: Clawitzer BREAK
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Lock-On
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon can’t retreat during your opponent’s next turn. During your next turn, any damage done to that Pokémon by attacks is increased by 120 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

rule_box: Clawitzer BREAK retains the attacks, Abilities, Weakness, Resistance, and Retreat Cost of its previous Evolution.
